name: Ecovalia-game
tagline: A print-and-play boardgame we're building for Australian #Govhack2015
body:
### Ecovalia

Ecovalia is a tabletop board/card game about the development and conservation of reserve and national parks in South Australia.

### How to get the game

We're currently working hard on getting the game ready to play.
Eventually we plan to release the game here on this website as a print-and-play game.
You will be able to download the PDF files for the game, print them out and get playing.

### Find out more

Follow us on twitter [@ecovaliaGame](http://twitter.com/ecovaliaGame) and [facebook/ecovaliaGame](http://facebook.com/ecovaliaGame) for updates.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
